app.crud module¶

app.crud.add_image_to_experiment_group(experiment_group, image_uid)¶
app.crud.add_measurement_to_experiment_group(experiment_group, uid)¶

app.crud.create_image(image)¶
app.crud.create_result_layer(result_layer)¶
app.crud.create_result_measurement(result_measurement)¶
app.crud.delete_result_layer(db_layer: app.api.classes_db.DbImageResultLayer)¶

Expects a c_db.DbResultLayer object. Deletes all associated measurements and the layer itself.

app.crud.read_classifier_by_uid(uid)¶

Expects classifier uid and returns c_int.IntClassifier object.

app.crud.read_classifier_dict_by_type(clf_type)¶

Expects clf_type as string as defined in utils_classes and returns a dict of {name: id}.

app.crud.read_experiment_group_by_uid(uid, for_refresh=False)¶

Expects experiment_group uid and returns c_int.IntExperimentGroup object.

app.crud.read_image_by_uid(uid, for_refresh=False)¶

Expects image uid and returns c_int.IntImage object.

app.crud.read_result_layers_of_image_uid(uid)¶

Expects image uid and returns a list of c_db.DbResultLayer objects.

app.crud.remove_image_from_experiment_group(experiment_group, image_uid)¶
app.crud.remove_measurement_from_experiment_group(experiment_group, uid)¶
app.crud.remove_result_layer_from_experiment_group(experiment_group, uid)¶
app.crud.update_image_bg_false(uid)¶
app.crud.update_image_bg_true(uid, layer_uid)¶
